title: Landing Page Schema
description: JSON schema for the OGC API - Common landing page

title.title: The title of the API.
title.description: While a title is not required, implementors are strongly advised to include one.

description.description: A textual description of the API

attribution.title: attribution for the API
attribution.description: The `attribution` should be short and intended for presentation to a user, for example, in a corner of a map. Parts of the text can be links to other resources if additional information is needed. The string can include HTML markup.

links.description: Links to the resources exposed through this API.
